thread.title: A very pregnant Ciara has the perfect Whitney Houston tribute
thread.title_full: A very pregnant Ciara has the perfect Whitney Houston tribute

author: Martha Tesema
title: A very pregnant Ciara has the perfect Whitney Houston tribute
text:
A very pregnant Ciara has the perfect Whitney Houston tribute 0 Whitney Houston accepts an award at the 2009 American Music Awards. Image: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images By Martha Tesema 2017-02-12 16:56:46 UTC 
Saturday marked the fifth anniversary of Whitney Houston's death, and folks found unique ways of paying their respects to the legendary singerâ€”but no one managed to honor Houston quite like Ciara. 
Ciara, who is expecting a child with NFL star Russell Wilson soon, danced her heart out with a perfect lip-sync to "I'm Every Woman" with her son Future making an adorable appearance in the short clip, along with a cameo from Wilson.
